derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French ambiant or Latin ambient- 'going round', from ambire

entry.def: The ambient temperature is the temperature of the air above the ground in a particular place.
Ambient sound or light is the sound or light which is all around you.

example.ex: ...ambient sounds of children in the background.
example.tran: 背景里环绕着孩子们的声音
